---
title: "Integrationist, segregationist preferences"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

M <- read.csv("datasets/M.csv",sep=",",skip=6)
basic1 <- read.csv("datasets/basic_compl.csv",sep=",",skip=6)
basic2 <- read.csv("datasets/basic_compl.csv",sep=",",skip=6)
glob <- read.csv("datasets/global.csv",sep=",",skip=6)

names(M) <- pull(read.csv("legend_M.csv"))
names(basic1) <- pull(read.csv("legend_basic.csv"))
names(basic2) <- pull(read.csv("legend_basic.csv"))
basic <- rbind(basic1,basic2)

names(glob) <- pull(read.csv("legend_global.csv"))

write.csv(M,"M.csv",row.names = F)
write.csv(basic,"basic.csv",row.names = F)
write.csv(glob,"global.csv",row.names = F)

```
